name: VRekken
description: VRekken is a physics driven Beat' em Up bulit for VR.  You can use your  punches, melee weapons and kicks (if you have 2 additional trackers) to beat up the bad guys. If you have been learning martial arts you can use your skills to your advantage. VRekken can be also used as self-defense trainer without the risk of getting concussions during sparring.
